sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.KBMyKnowledgeAJAXSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>[WARNING: Customers should NOT modify this script]

The purpose of this script include is to provide default AJAX behaviours for the widgets on My Knowledge page.
To change the behaviour of these methods (or add new methods), customers should override/add new methods to the KBMyKnowledgeAJAX script include.</description>
        <name>KBMyKnowledgeAJAXSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var KBMyKnowledgeAJAXSNC = Class.create();

KBMyKnowledgeAJAXSNC.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getArticles: function() {
        var type = this.getParameter("sysparm_type");
        var windowStart = this.getParameter("sysparm_window_start");
		var isDoctype = this.getParameter("sysparm_is_doctype");
        var response = {};

        var myKnowledge = new KBMyKnowledge(type, windowStart);
        var articles = myKnowledge.getArticles();

        var jr = new GlideJellyRunner();
        jr.setEscaping(false);
        jr.setVariable("jvar_type", type);
		jr.setVariable("jvar_is_doctype", isDoctype);
        jr.setVariable("jvar_results", articles.results);

        response["htmlResult"] = jr.runMacro("kb_my_" + type);
        response["data"] = articles;

        return (new JSON()).encode(response);
    }
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-10-25 15:28:06</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>78130de0ef403100438236caa5c0fb07</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>KBMyKnowledgeAJAXSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Knowledge Management Core" source="com.glideapp.knowledge">e011410f6d2620100acb70b353433002</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_78130de0ef403100438236caa5c0fb07</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-11-10 15:06:33</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>856</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
